title: Npc Configuration
description: All of the categorized, weighted traits an npc can possess

trait_categories.description: List of all categories of traits. By default an NPC can only have 1 trait from each category.

trait_category.description: A list of related traits. Usually an npc to have one of the traits in the category.

name.description: The user-facing name for the trait category

selections.description: How many traits from this category will be selected. No trait can be selected twice.

traits.description: List of all traits in one category. By default an NPC can only have 1 trait from a category.

trait.description: An Npc trait, with a name and weight.

name.description: The user-facing name for the trait

weight.description: The likelihood that this trait will be picked. Two traits of equal weight are equally as likely to be picked. If one trait has double the weight of another, it is twice as likely to be picked. If the sum of all weights in a category add up to 100, the weight is a percentage change to be picked.

hidden.description: Whether the trait is shown in Npcs. For example a hidden Npc quirk of 'None'. Optional and assumed false if not present.
